remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.278.3.4 the epithet pays homage to the late botanist Lúcia Sevegnani (1958–2015), who for many years greatly contributed to the knowledge of the flora of SC

name: Wahlenbergia itatiaiensis
distribution: Rio de Janeiro (Brazil Southeast, Brazil, Southern America)
remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.436.2.7 The epithet is a reference to the Itatiaia National Park, the locality where the species was collected and is, until now, endemic.
